text: Afọ 6000 akụkọ ihe mere eme mmadụ na-ahụ anya

notes: timespan, age (Adam was 130 years old when Shem was born)
years when used as age for a person (different word than years in some languages)
if the word "year" appears after the numeral, like "at the age of 35 years"
first king of southern kingdom of Juda
For 3 years Jeoahaz and Jeoash reigned together
reign only recorded 6 months, probably only established 792 BCE

text: Izrel nọ n’ala ịkpa 1513 ruo 1473 T.O.A. - afọ 40
english: Israel in the wilderness 1513 to 1473 B.C.E. – 40 years

text: Afọ 479 ruo mgbe e wuchara ụlọ nsọ ahụ—1 Ndị Eze 6:1
english: 479 years until the temple construction – 1 Kings 6:1

text: Jizọs mere baptizim n’oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke 29 O.A.
Afọ 3.5 nke ije ozi Jisọs, e gburu Nisan 14, 33 O.A.
english: 3.5 years of Jesus service, executed Nisan 14th, 33 C.E.

text: Oge 7 - afọ 2520 ruo n’Alaeze Mezaịa ahụ 1914 O.A. (Daniel 4:23)
english: 7 times – 2520 years to the Messianic Kingdom 1914 C.E. (Daniel 4:23)

text: Agha Afọ Iri Atọ na Europe 1618-1648
Njem ozi-ọma mbụ nke Pọl, c. 47-48 O.A. na Banabas na Jọn Mak
english: First Missionary Journey of Paul, c. 47-48 C.E. with Barnabas and John Mark

text: Okwu ibi úgwù n’Antiọk, ọgbakọ dị na Jerusalem c. 49 O.A.
english: Circumcision issue at Antioch, conference in Jerusalem c. 49 C.E.

text: Njem ozi ala ọzọ nke abụọ c. 49-52 O.A. na Saịlas (Silvanus)
english: Second Missionary Journey c. 49-52 C.E with Silas (Silvanus)

text: Njem ozi ala ọzọ nke atọ c. 52-56 O.A.
Pọl nọ n’ụlọ mkpọrọ na Sesaria c. 56-58 O.A.
english: Paul in custody in Caesarea c. 56-58 C.E.

text: Mkpọrọ Pọl mbụ na Rom c. 59-61 O.A.
english: Paul’s first imprisonment in Rome c. 59-61 C.E.

text: A tụrụ Pọl mkpọrọ nke abụọ na Rom c. 65 OA, 2 Timoti dere, Pọl gburu
english: Paul’s second imprisonment in Rome c. 65 CE, 2 Timothy written, Paul executed

text: Galba, Otho na Vitellius (Afọ nke ndị eze ukwu anọ)
english: Galba, Otho and Vitellius (Year of the Four Emperors)
Exodus from Egypt on Nisan 14th, 1513 B.C.E.

text: E bibiri Sameria na 740 T.O.A. nke Asiria
english: Destruction of Samaria 740 B.C.E. by Assyria

text: Mbibi nke Jerusalem 607 T.O.A. site na Babịlọn, afọ 390 ka e kewasịrị alaeze ahụ (Ezikiel 4:5)
english: Destruction of Jerusalem 607 B.C.E. by Babylon, 390 years after the division of the kingdom (Ezekiel 4:5)

text: E wughachiri ụlọ nsọ dị na Jeruselem n’afọ 515 T.O.A.
E wughachiri mgbidi Jeruselem n’afọ 455 T.O.A.
Mbibi nke Rom bibiri Jerusalem 70 O.A. n’okpuru Taịtọs
english: Destruction of Jerusalem 70 C.E. by Rome under Titus

text: Ọgwụgwụ nke oge mba dị iche iche, alaeze Chineke malitere ịchị n’eluigwe 1914 O.A.
english: End of the time of the nations, Gods kingdom starts to rule in heaven 1914 C.E.

text: ghọrọ eze mgbe ọ dị afọ
Vulgate nke Jerome dechara (nsụgharị Latin nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ) c. 405 O.A.
english: Vulgate completed by Jerome (Latin translation of the bible) c. 405 C.E.

text: Akwụkwọ Nsọ Gutenberg e bipụtara na 1455
Ihe odide Grik nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ Grik nke Ndị Kraịst nke Desiderius Erasmus nke Rotterdam bipụtara na 1516
english: Greek text of Christian Greek Scriptures published by Desiderius Erasmus of Rotterdam 1516
middle of week “sacrifice to cease” Daniel 9:27

text: Kọniliọs mere baptizim ná ngwụsị nke izu 70 (Daniel 9:24) na 36 O.A.
english: Cornelius baptized at the end of 70 weeks (Daniel 9:24) in 36 C.E.

text: njedebe nke oge tupu Colombia na America 1492
english: end of the pre-columbian period in the Americas 1492

text: nkwupụta nke nnwere onwe nke 13 colonies na America 1776
english: declaration of independence of 13 colonies in America 1776

text: Tischendorf chọtara Codex Sinaiticus na narị afọ nke anọ na 1844
english: Tischendorf discovers the Codex Sinaiticus from the 4th century in 1844

text: Edere Akwụkwọ Mpịakọta Osimiri Nwụrụ Anwụ
E bipụtara mbipụta mbụ nke “Zion’s Watch Tower and Herald of Christ’s Presence” na 1879.
english: The first issue of “Zion’s Watch Tower and Herald of Christ’s Presence” is published in 1879

text: Ẹkebem iso ẹwụt “Photo-Drama of Creation” ke New York ke January 11, 1914.
english: The “Photo-Drama of Creation” is first shown in New York on January 11, 1914

text: Ndị Mmụta Baịbụl nakweere aha ọhụrụ— Ndịàmà Jehova. Na Columbus, Ohio, 1931
english: The Bible Students adopted a new name – Jehovah’s Witnesses. In Columbus, Ohio, 1931

text: Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Gilied malitere na Mọnde, Febụwarị 1, 1943
english: Watchtower Bible School of Gilead began on Monday, February 1, 1943

text: “Nsụgharị Ụwa Ọhụrụ nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ” e wepụtara na Manchester, England na June 18, 1960
english: “New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures” released in Manchester, England on June 18, 1960

text: Akwụkwọ bụ́ “Eziokwu nke Na-eduba ná Ndụ Ebighị Ebi” e wepụtara na 1968
english: The book “The Truth That Leads to Eternal Life” released 1968

text: Amalitere ịgba àmà n’obodo ukwu n’afọ 2011
Ọtọn̄ọde ke JW.ORG ye mme item ke utom Obio Ubọn̄ December 2012
english: Start of JW.ORG with instructions in kingdom ministry December 2012

text: “Nsụgharị Ụwa Ọhụrụ nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ” e degharịrị ná nzukọ kwa afọ 2013
english: Revised “New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures” released at annual meeting 2013

text: Malite izisa ozi ọma na jw.org n’ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2014
Usoro ọhụrụ nke nzukọ etiti izu nwere "akwụkwọ ọrụ nzukọ" malite na Jenụwarị 2016
english: New format of midweek meeting with “meeting workbook” starting January 2016

text: Ọrịa Covid-19 zuru ụwa ọnụ na-eduga na mkpọchi mkpọchi, ichepụ iche na nzukọ mbugharị
english: Global Covid-19 pandemic leads to lockdowns, quarantine and zoom-meetings

text: Emebere usoro iheomume a na 2023, afọ kachasị mma na akụkọ ntolite mmadụ na afọ 125,000 gara aga.
english: This timeline was created in 2023, the hottest year in human history and the last 125,000 years

text: Leningrad Codex dere na Cairo AD 1008
english: Leningrad Codex written in Cairo AD 1008

text: Jọn dere “mkpughe” mgbe a chụpụrụ ya na Patmọs 96-98 O.A.
english: John writes “revelation” while exiled on Patmos 96-98 C.E.
The Buddha – Siddhartha Gautama c.563-c.483 B.C.E

text: Hijrah - Njem Mecca gaa Medina 16 Julaị 622
english: Hijrah - Journey Mecca to Medina 16 July 622

text: 1553 T.O.A. Mosis aghaghị ịgbanarị Ijipt—Ọpụpụ 2:15, Ọrụ 7:23
english: 1553 B.C.E. Moses has to escape Egypt – Exodus 2:15, Acts 7:23

text: 1513 T.O.A. Ijipt nwetara ihe otiti iri
Josef rere Josef dị ka ohu mgbe ọ dị afọ 17 - Jen 37: 2
english: Joseph sold as slave at the age of 17 – Gen 37:2

text: Saịrọs Onye Ukwu, Cambyses nke Abụọ, Dariọs I 490 TOA, Xerxes I 480 TOA (di Esta, Daniel 11:2)
english: Cyrus the Great, Cambyses II, Darius I 490 BCE, Xerxes I 480 BCE (husband of Esther, Daniel 11:2)

text: Seleucus I Nicator (v5) Siria ruo Antiochus III (v10) na Seleucus IV (v18, 19) gbadaa Octavian (v20) na Taịbiriọs (v21-24)
english: Seleucus I Nicator (v5) Syria to Antiochus III (v10) and Seleucus IV (v18, 19) down to Octavian (v20) and Tiberius (v21-24)

text: Ptolemy I, II, III, IV (v11, 12), V (v15, 16) gaa n’agha Actium 31 T.O.A.
english: Ptolemy I, II, III, IV (v11, 12), V (v15, 16) to the battle Actium 31 B.C.E.

text: Alaeze Ukwu Britain 1870, Anglo-American World Power kemgbe 1914
english: British empire 1870, Anglo-American World Power since 1914

text: Ọnụnọ nke Kraịst, ngwụcha nke usoro ihe a (Mt 24: 3), ụbọchị ikpeazụ (2Ti 3: 1)
english: Presence of Christ, Conclusion of the system of things (Matt 24:3), the last days (2Ti 3:1)

text: Eze Suryavarman II wuru Angkor Wat 1113-1150
english: King Suryavarman II builds Angkor Wat 1113-1150

notes: no text left and right – empty!
influence on Latin language, 3 Jan 106 BC – 7 Dec 43 BC

text: Ọchịchị Ming na eze ukwu China
Xia dynasty in China c. 2070 – c. 1600 BC
english: Xia dynasty in China c. 2070 – c. 1600 BC
